usefulItems: baking dish (25 cm x 20 cm), oven
title: Spicy Cornbread Gratin

ingredients.content: 30 g butter, plus extra for greasing
400 g cornbread, cut in large chunks (3-4 cm)
½ - 1 tsp dried chilli flakes, to taste
½ - 1 tsp chilli powder, to taste

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C and generously grease a small baking dish (approx. 25 cm x 20 cm).
Place prepared dish on mixing bowl lid and weigh in cornbread pieces. Remove dish and set aside.
Place butter, onion and chilli flakes in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed <b>.

Add milk, chilli powder, coriander, oregano, salt and eggs then mix <b>30 sec/speed 3<b>. Pour over cornbread in prepared dish. Bake for 20 minutes (180°C) until browned. Serve with chilli con carne or bean enchiladas.

hintsAndTricks: Grate over some cheese before baking.
